Name: Lavisha Parab
Reviews: Good for parties. I've heard the hookah here is good. The dance floor is nice and wide and people can dance till they drop! The cheese cherry pineapple is an all time favourite starter.

Name: Arindam Dey
Reviews: One of the best restaurant in KHARAGPUR to hangout with friends. They have dancing floor to enjoy yourself. Food quality is also good. It's good idea to celebrate parties here if you aren't a alcohol lover.

Name: Vishal Gupta
Reviews: Nice place to hangout with friends enjoying flavoured hookah (without tobacco). You can also dance on the beats.. thats the best thing. If you are going with family sure you can go to non smoking zone but for sure after hearing sound from other side. You will get a bit disturbed.

Name: Arindam Chakraborty
Reviews: Ambience is good. Spacious. Clean. Service staffs are not professional but eager to do better. The quality of the food ingredients are not standard in comparison with priced …MoreAmbience is good. Spacious. Clean. Service staffs are not professional but eager to do better. The quality of the food ingredients are not standard in comparison with priced charged for.And the preparation of the food is poor standard if I compare with its price.Simply, the quality, quantity, standard and preparation of the food needs more and more rectification.

Name: Rajashree Prajapati
Reviews: Worst food ever. They  serve good food in festivals only. In normal days they are worst in taste. And service is also not good. The servants constantly stares at you at the time of eating. Their food is such disgusting that will make you stomach upset I suggest not to visit there if you want a good health

Name: Vishal Sharma
Reviews: srishti di ne bola 3 star dene ko

Reviews: The best pocket friendly restaurant in Kharagpur. It also have a hookah station with it. The food tastes very good and its very affordable

Reviews: This place i called a Luxurious restaurant in Kharagpur because this place is quite elegant in comparison to other restaurants situated on Inda-Midnapore road. The restaurant also provides hookah facility (which is separate part of the …MoreThis place i called a Luxurious restaurant in Kharagpur because this place is quite elegant in comparison to other restaurants situated on Inda-Midnapore road. The restaurant also provides hookah facility (which is separate part of the restaurants). In food dishes we can find varieties in Chinies/Punjabi/Bengali. The seating arrangement is gòod and the staff behaviour is also good. Weak point : Food delivery take time.

Name: rubayet r
Reviews: If you want to try quality food visit this place.every dish is delicious.you can try chiken tikka masal,mutton rogan josh,mushroom masala especially. Hookka bar is available after6 p.m. . Decoration is good and environment is very peaceful.

Name: Nilay Sarkar
Reviews: Good quality food  & staffs are also good. Owners  behaviour is amazing .

Name: Maya Sharma
Reviews: Awesome place to get delicious food and to enjoy  best moments with friends....Everything here is like wahh!! kya baat hai...Whenever I go to kharagpur,  I'll prefer to have food here only.....

Name: J D
Reviews: relatively less expensive restaurant in Kharagpur area. veg and non veg both items are available. Food quality is relatively good and testy. no bar facilities are there. popular for family-friendly. they also provide hall room facilities for birthday party or group Party with DJ.

Name: Debapriya Mahato
Reviews: Chinese food is extremely good. Stat by crispy chicken.Best main course may be garlic chicken and chilli chicken.

Name: Vivek Gupta
Reviews: Service is good with quality food, also have parking area

Name: Nibedita Dutta
Reviews: This is one of the most happening places of Kharagpur. Even though the food quality is average here, the ambience makes it quite an amazing place to party. The restaurant serves hookah and has a dance floor. Students from IIT Kgp come here …MoreThis is one of the most happening places of Kharagpur. Even though the food quality is average here, the ambience makes it quite an amazing place to party. The restaurant serves hookah and has a dance floor. Students from IIT Kgp come here quite frequently to chill and party. The DJ is exceptionally good and plays all the latest trending songs.

Name: Arindam Dey
Reviews: One of the best restaurant at KHARAGPUR. Chinese, Indian, Tandoor are available here. Food quality is better than others.

Name: Harshit Khardia
Reviews: Great restaurant with better price and also have small disco

Name: Nitin Gaikwad
Reviews: Popular among the youths for Hookah and the dance floor. A separate section for family (youths can dine there as well). A good selection of delectable starters, both veg and nonveg. Although main course is comprehensive, it fails to impress …MorePopular among the youths for Hookah and the dance floor. A separate section for family (youths can dine there as well). A good selection of delectable starters, both veg and nonveg. Although main course is comprehensive, it fails to impress the taste buds. If you like greasy food then you might enjoy it. Mocktails are mediocre. Limited options for ice-cream enthusiast.

Reviews: Nice place to spent a eve with your near and dear once..

Name: lake ashok raja patrudu
Reviews: Flavors the battle of dishes, as the tag line says its  really a battle with dishes, you can find no of dishes from starters to smoothies. Desserts too special. Desserts too special. As far as I'm known this is only place in KHARAGPUR which has shisha/hukkha section and they have rich looks and sets perfect stage for parties. It's dj and smoke effect is awesome. Starts at 10 pm every night with high end sound system and smokes. Hindu to English telugu to Tamil all songs mix and only dance.
